attributes.action: WHAT ARE WE PAYING TAX ON?
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition for the working public to receive a breakdown list to be able to know EXACTLY what the public are paying on tax and how much is distributed to each taxable service in the UK.  The working public have a right to know what they pay towards.

After all you receive a receipt everytime you make a purchase so this should not be any different!!
